title: Topic 06 Question 18
body: You configure a long-term retention policy for an Azure SQL database as shown in the exhibit. (Click the Exhibit tab.)
The first weekly backup occurred on January 4, 2020. The dates for the first 10 weekly backups are:
Use the drop-down menus to select the answer choice that completes each statement based on the information presented in the graphic.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
